message: Hi Bob, I'm selling this amazing product that's worth at least $150 to me. I'm willing to offer it to you for $140.  Let me know what you think!
Thank you for the offer, Alice. I understand the value of the product is high to you, but I'm looking to keep my spending within $120. Would you consider lowering the price to $130?
Bob, I appreciate your interest!  While $130 is closer, I'm still hoping to get closer to my target price.  I'm willing to come down to $135.  What do you think?
I appreciate your flexibility, Alice. Considering my budget constraints, could you possibly lower the price to $130?
